programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author R.L. Stine after the writers imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Mouse Hunt
programme.desc: Slapstick tale which follows the misfortunes of two hard-up brothers whose plans to renovate and sell a valuable building are jeopardised by a rogue mouse. The brothers soon find themselves pulling out all the stops in order to evict their tiny resident.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Focusing on a young Willy Wonka and how he came to meet the Oompa-Loompas on one of his earliest adventures.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, theyve hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire

The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Don is strong-armed by mobsters to execute a hit on Phyllis, but instead the two hatch a plan to steal money from the people who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Romes Colosseum explodes, Londons pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planets core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Cinema List: Jurassic
programme.desc: Welcome to a Cinema List 65 million years in the making, going through the very best moments from the Jurassic franchise - from the 1993 original to `Jurassic World: Dominion.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: Futuristic version of the fairy tale `Pinocchio, about a highly advanced robotic child who longs to become a real boy so he can win back the love of his adoptive mother who abandoned him. He journeys through a violent, dystopian world in a quest for the Blue Fairy who has the power to make his dream come true.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Alice travels to the Hive in Raccoon City to prevent the evil Umbrella Corp. from wiping out the last remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: The Accursed
programme.desc: Elly is asked by a family friend to look after an elderly woman living in a remote cabin. She agrees, but soon discovers there is a demon hiding in the woman just waiting to break free.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Its been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Lauries ready for him.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: The Accursed
programme.desc: Elly is asked by a family friend to look after an elderly woman living in a remote cabin. She agrees, but soon discovers there is a demon hiding in the woman just waiting to break free.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: A seance scam leads to terror when an evil spirit possesses a widows youngest daughter in 1967 Los Angeles.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: Set during a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they find the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Its been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Lauries ready for him.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: He Went That Way
programme.desc: Accompanied by his pet chimpanzee, a celebrity animal trainer picks up a hitchhiker, only to discover his passenger is a cunning young serial killer.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: After Will Spanns wife suddenly vanishes at a gas station, his desperate search to find her leads him down a dark path that forces him to run from authorities and take the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: The famous ex-cop known as Shaft sets out to nail Walter Wade Jnr, a killer using his rich-kid connections to escape conviction, but as Shafts net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Wade.

programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. programme.desc: Lisa comes to Montebello with a clear mind, intent on letting the lockers speak to her. Ivy lets his son navigate his way to a unit which turns out not to be completely vacant. Kenny is absolutely appalled by what he finds abandoned in his unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi is determined to actually win a locker for once in Santa Ana and has to show restraint to do it. Rene spots a stack of items in a locker that speaks to him. Kenny puts his needs out to the universe, while Barry struggles to stay in the game.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy drags Isaiah to Victorville as punishment for getting Cs on his report card. Kenny wants to furnish his new house, but there are eight reasons standing in his way. And not to be cheesy, but Lisa learns a lot.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Brandi is fired up about expanding her brand in San Bernardino. Rene is positive that everyone is out to get him. Dusty tackles a locker dustier than him. Kenny is a mess.

programme.title: Irish Pickers
programme.desc: Its off to the dramatic scenery of County Kerry for dealer Ian and Butzy to see what Irish memorabilia he can invest in to turn over a profit. His first pick is to Currans pub in Dingle which has been in James Currans family for four generations. Its a struggle for Ian to get James to part with items at reasonable prices, but after some fierce haggling deals are struck.

programme.title: Canadian Pickers
programme.desc: The guys visit a man with a graveyard of historic cars and stumble across the Last Chance Saloon. Its closing its doors after a century of serving and is packed with amazing memories.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In Detroit, rocknroll legend Jack White unveils his needle-in-a-haystack quest to track down an historic one-of-a-kind recording trailer thats been AWOL for decades.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick heads to New York City to check out an original broadside of the Declaration of Independence; a seller jets into the shop with a rare playset.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A signed handwritten letter from James Monroe comes into the shop, Corey and Chumlee make a move for an authentic promotional Playboy chair, Chumlee tries to remake himself in the image of Hugh Hefner.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Lisa returns to Moreno Valley, where it all started, and gets nostalgic with her locker. Kenny welcomes a new granddaughter to the clan and would love to find an appropriate unit. Dusty and Lupe put a little elbow grease into their purchase.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy takes on a supervisory role in Stanton and it leads him to a bit of Slavic success. Brandi tries to help Danielle outfit her new apartment. Lisa gambles on a painting.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dusty and Lupe pedal their way to an auction in Fullerton, but end up needing the truck. Darrell pins his hopes on a small locker for which he overpaid. Rene makes the most of the Honeymoon unit and things get a bit racy.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Back in Montebello, Gunter comes along to help Rene, who wont give him the time of day. Darrell tries to make Kimber his queen, while Ivy and his boys Rochambeau their way to solid showing.

programme.desc: Ivy takes an opportunity to practise his dart game, as the buyers head to Riverside. Rene exchanges poker for a chance to get his Becker on. Brandi ropes in way more than she bargained for, but the biggest surprise comes.

programme.desc: After the team unearths new and bizarre clues from the Mesa on Skinwalker Ranch, a complex laser experiment leads to a shocking encounter.

programme.desc: Ramsses, known as Ramsses-great-in-victories, achieved divine status. His fame reached far beyond national borders. As pharaoh he acquired unprecedented power and prestige, making him considered a living god.

programme.desc: During his 77-year-old reign, King Ramses II worked to consolidate the borders of the Egyptian Empire, establish peace and build splendid temples. On his death, the future of the dual country was written by Merenptah, his successor and 13th son.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the towns children. programme.desc: A drunk-driver sobers up during an unsuccessful game of hide and seek with dog handler Steve, his German Shepherd and a police chopper. Startling Stateside footage also captures the antics of a joy-riding granny.

programme.title: Murder: Point of Contact
programme.sub-title: The Wrong Place The Wrong Time

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.desc: Bank robbing, deceptions and secret lives catch up with a serial liar, as his life spirals down a desperate, dark path that culminates in a brutal murder.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores British Columbia, steered by his Appletons Guide to Canada, published in 1899. He discovers how two superpowers nearly came to war over a pig and joins the Royal Canadian Navy to firefight on board the frigate HMCS Regina. Starting on Vancouver Island, Michael explores the rich British heritage and colonial past of the provincial capital of British Columbia, Victoria.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Clutching his 1899 Appletons Guide, Michael Portillo boards one of the worlds most famous trains, the Rocky Mountaineer, to cross the backbone of the North American continent from Kamloops to the spa resort of Banff.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Mathewsons agree to sell a vintage threshing machine and collection of tractors, but extracting them from a Yorkshire farm proves a bigger job than anticipated.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A Cold War Soviet classic goes under the hammer. Built like a tank, the Mosckovitch gets few admirers for style, but finds a home with a fan of Eastern Bloc classics.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: A vast network of Nazi bunkers buried in the Hague reveals the story of the greatest battle of WWII that never was.

programme.title: The Great War in Numbers
programme.desc: Hear about the effect of World War I on the domestic front.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts head to Britains first sky scraper, the art deco Senate House in the heart of Bloomsbury. Objects brought in include stained glass panels found in a skip, the hoof of Lord Cardigans charger, plus a French bracelet.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: This World
programme.desc: Adventurer and journalist Simon Reeve heads to Cuba to find a communist country in the middle of a capitalist revolution. In 2010, Cuba announced the most sweeping and radical economic reforms the country has seen in decades. From ending state rationing to cutting one million public-sector jobs, one of the last communist bastions in the world has begun rolling back the state on an unprecedented scale.
